# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $100 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and unique benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $95. Don't miss out on this chance to acquire something truly special at a fantastic deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer
